headlines.description: Arsenal's dominance against Burnley continued with a 2-1 win at the Emirates on Saturday, with Dani Ceballos standing out in his first start.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal see off Burnley as Ceballos shines

headlines.description: Two early goals were enough for Bournemouth to earn a 2-1 win over Aston Villa on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: No home joy for Villa as Bournemouth earn first victory

events.name: West Ham United at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Leandro Trossard's superb strike cancelled out a second-half goal by West Ham's Javier Hernandez as Brighton held West Ham 1-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Trossard shines on debut as Brighton draw 1-1 with West Ham

headlines.description: An early goal from Bernard was enough for a nervy Everton to beat Watford 1-0 at Goodison Park on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Early Bernard goal earns nervy Everton win over Watford

headlines.description: Norwich City's Finland striker Teemu Pukki grabbed a hat-trick, including a thunderous volley, as they beat Newcastle United 3-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pukki hat-trick gives Norwich win over Newcastle

headlines.description: Liverpool made it two wins from two to start the season following a 2-1 victory at Southampton on Saturday.

video.headline: Premier League takeaways - Man City dazzle, Liverpool unconvincing

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL PD41 (Premier League takeaways - Man City dazzle, Liverpool unconvincing) 2019/08/17 GLOBAL

headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool beat Saints despite Adrian howler

headlines.description: Manchester City and Tottenham Hotspur drew 2-2 in a thrilling Premier League match at the Etihad on Saturday that saw VAR take centre stage.

video.headline: Premier League takeaways - Man City dazzle, Liverpool unconvincing

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL PD41 (Premier League takeaways - Man City dazzle, Liverpool unconvincing) 2019/08/17 GLOBAL

headlines.shortLinkText: VAR denies City winner in draw with Tottenham
